title: Korea, the circle of life: traditional customs and rituals
creator_credit: Centron Films and Korean National Film Unit
brief_description: In this film, Korean social patterns and customs are depicted in a study of the major events in the cycle of life. The film examines the structure of Korean customs and their purpose in the traditional society.
